00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 using System.Text;
00026 
00027 using NyFolder;
00028 using NyFolder.Utils;
00029 
00030 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Base {
00032     public static class Dialogs {
00033         // ============================================
00034         // PUBLIC Methods
00035         // ============================================
00037         public static void MessageError (string title, string message) {
00038             MessageDialog dialog;
00039 
00040             dialog = new MessageDialog (null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Error,
00041                                         ButtonsType.Close, true, 
00042                                         "<span size='x-large'><b>{0}</b></span>\n\n{1}",
00043                                         title, message);
00044             dialog.Run();
00045             dialog.Destroy();
00046         }
00047 
00049         public static bool QuestionDialog (string title, string message) {
00050             MessageDialog dialog;
00051             dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Question, 
00052                                         ButtonsType.YesNo, true, 
00053                                         "<span size='x-large'><b>{0}</b></span>\n\n{1}",
00054                                         title, message);
00055             bool response = (ResponseType) dialog.Run() == ResponseType.Yes;
00056             dialog.Destroy();
00057             return(response);
00058         }
00059 
00061         public static string SaveFile (string path, string fileName) {
00062             FileChooserDialog dialog = new FileChooserDialog("Save File", null,
00063                                                              FileChooserAction.Save);
00064             dialog.AddButton(Stock.Cancel, ResponseType.Cancel);
00065             dialog.AddButton(Stock.Save, ResponseType.Ok);
00066 
00067             dialog.SelectMultiple = false;
00068             dialog.SetCurrentFolder(path);
00069 
00070             FileInfo fileInfo = new FileInfo(fileName);
00071             dialog.CurrentName = fileInfo.Name;
00072 
00073             string filePath = null;
00074             do {
00075                 if ((ResponseType) dialog.Run() != ResponseType.Ok) {
00076                     filePath = null;
00077                     break;
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 if (File.Exists(dialog.Filename) == false) {
00081                     filePath = dialog.Filename;
00082                     break;
00083                 }
00084 
00085                 if (ReplaceExistingFile(dialog.Filename) == true) {
00086                     filePath = dialog.Filename;
00087                     break;
00088                 }
00089             } while (true);
00090             dialog.Destroy();
00091             return(filePath);
00092         }
00093 
00095         public static bool ReplaceExistingFile (string fileName) {
00096             FileInfo fileInfo = new FileInfo(fileName);
00097 
00098             StringBuilder msg = new StringBuilder();
00099             msg.AppendFormat("A file named \"{0}\" already exists.\n", fileInfo.Name);
00100             msg.Append("Do you want to replace it ?\n\n");
00101             msg.AppendFormat("The file already exists in \"{0}\".\n", fileInfo.DirectoryName);
00102             msg.Append("Replacing it will overwrite its contents.");
00103 
00104             return(QuestionDialog("Replace File", msg.ToString()));
00105         }
00106 
00107         // ============================================
00108         // PRIVATE Methods
00109         // ============================================
00110 
00111     }
00112 }
